poddr 0.0.1
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Reference

Collecting data

The Incomparable

incomparable_get_episodes()

Retrieve all episodes for The Incomparable shows

incomparable_get_shows()

Retrieve all The Incomparable shows

incomparable_parse_archive()

Parse a show's archive page on The Incomparable website

incomparable_parse_stats()

Parse The Incomparable stats.txt files

relay.fm

relay_get_episodes()

Retrieve all episodes for relay.fm shows

relay_get_shows()

Retrieve all relay.fm shows

relay_parse_feed()

Parse a relay.fm show feed

ATP

atp_get_episodes()

Retrieve ATP episodes

atp_parse_page()

Parse a single ATP page

Utilities

These functions are basic building blocks – you don’t have to use them directly.

gather_people()

Gather episode datasets by people

cache_podcast_data()

Cache episode data

label_n()

Convenience function to display N

parse_duration()

Converting HH:MM:SS or MM:SS to hms

This package

poddr-package

poddr: Collect Metadata for Selected Podcasts

Developed by Lukas Burk.
